oai_dc:dc.dc:title: MINACT Board
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hooks, Benjamin L.; MINACT; Board of Directors; portraits;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Board of Directors of MINACT, Inc., a contractor that supports the U.S. Department of Labor's Job Corps program. Benjamin Hooks served as Chairman of the Board. Seated, from left to right: Robert Smith, Benjamin Hooks, Booker T. Jones; Standing: Sam Devore, an unidentified male, Reuben V. Anderson, Alveno Castilla, John I. Douglas, and an unidentified female.
